#{item}
mapper.delete: delete from qostemplateinfo where templateName = #{templateName} and qosType = #{qosType}
mapper.insert: insert into qostemplateinfo (id, templateName, qosType, seq, cos, direction, cir, cbs, eir, ebs, pir, pbs, strategy, colorSense) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{qosType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ebs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{strategy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{colorSence,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update qostemplateinfo set templateName = #{templateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, qosType = #{qosType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, seq = #{seq,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cos = #{cos,jdbcType=INTEGER}, direction = #{direction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, cir = #{cir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, cbs = #{cbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, eir = #{eir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, ebs = #{ebs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pir = #{pir,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pbs = #{pbs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, strategy = #{strategy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, colorSense = #{colorSence,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
